description: A large, heavy hammer. Good for smashing things
A kit of medical supplies for treating physical injuries. Make an action with the Aid skill to heal damage equal to the result
A light, throwable blade, often used for offensive purposes, or for slicing bread
A shortbow and quiver of arrows. Make an action with the Shoot skill to fire and deal damage equal to the result
Makes the wearer more visually attractive and charming when worn with nothing else. Or, it may be offputting outside of socially accepted settings, such as beaches and pools.
When made into tea, helps improve calmness and focus
Helps to see things in the dark
Helps to see things far away
A container which holds up to 12 servings of drinking water (or any liquid)
